programme.title: All Politics is Local
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke recalls his very odd introduction to American politics.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke recalls his very odd introduction to American politics; explains why Boston's top politicians have always been Irish and why all politics is really local.
